LABEL: 0xD8
STRING: Memories change color easily.

LABEL: 0x104
STRING: Two years had passed since the accident.

LABEL: 0x12C
STRING: I should've changed the way I referred to myself by now... The change was necessary to fit in with my new environment.

LABEL: 0x197
STRING: Years passed even after the accident.

LABEL: 0x1BE
STRING: I thought a lot of things had changed.

LABEL: 0x1EC
STRING: Aside from the direct consequences of the accident, events not related to it also brought about various effects.

LABEL: 0x251
STRING: Many things changed.

LABEL: 0x273
STRING: Nothing stayed the same.

LABEL: 0x297
STRING: Nothing you did would stay unchanged.

LABEL: 0x2BF
STRING: It couldn't be helped.

LABEL: 0x2DA
STRING: But, was that true?

LABEL: 0x2F7
STRING: Had the undying jellyfish changed, isolated from time?

LABEL: 0x356
STRING: Did it have the capability to change?

LABEL: 0x384
STRING: 「Reiri, come down to everyone.」

LABEL: 0x3BB
STRING: Every time I spoke to her back, she answered without stopping her pen.

LABEL: 0x408
STRING: 「Why? For what purpose? What meaning is there?」

LABEL: 0x451
STRING: To me, it looked like Reiri hadn't changed.

LABEL: 0x483
STRING: Thinking that those questions were her way of refusing, I kept my mouth shut.

LABEL: 0x4C7
STRING: That was probably an obvious conclusion to make, and generally speaking, I was confident that it was right.

LABEL: 0x524
STRING: However, this was Reiri.

LABEL: 0x548
STRING: How much meaning did words like "obvious" and "generally" really have when it came to her?

LABEL: 0x58B
STRING: Thinking back on it now, she seemed to have been listening intently.

LABEL: 0x5DC
STRING: I didn't think Reiri really knew what it meant to be with everyone.

LABEL: 0x62E
STRING: Did she not understand?

LABEL: 0x65B
STRING: I was sure I should have answered her.

LABEL: 0x68B
STRING: As her older sister and only relative, it must have been my duty to convey common sense to her.

LABEL: 0x6EA
STRING: However.

LABEL: 0x701
STRING: Realizing that didn't change anything.

LABEL: 0x73D
STRING: 「Why? For what purpose? What meaning is there?」

LABEL: 0x770
STRING: I still couldn't answer her question.

LABEL: 0x795
STRING: After all, to this day, Reiri had never come out of her room if there was no need.

LABEL: 0x7FA
STRING: Even though she had been in the institution for a long time, I had never seen her speaking with anyone other than me.

LABEL: 0x868
STRING: Her lifestyle after entering the institution was abnormal, even from my perspective.

LABEL: 0x8BB
STRING: She stayed awake from Monday to Saturday with the help of medicine and studied, and devoted all of Sunday to sleeping――

LABEL: 0x923
STRING: I didn't understand.

LABEL: 0x944
STRING: I couldn't even imagine it.

LABEL: 0x963
STRING: She was barely eating, and while she did go to school, she didn't attend any classes.

LABEL: 0x9C3
STRING: That wasn't normal for a high school student, let alone for a human being.

LABEL: 0xA24
STRING: The only time Reiri faced me was on that day, two years after the accident.

LABEL: 0xA72
STRING: We were thirteen years old, and it was a winter day.

LABEL: 0xABC
STRING: That evening, I went to deliver dinner to Reiri as usual.

LABEL: 0xB0D
STRING: As a common rule, everyone ate together in the dining hall at dinner time, which was a requirement at the institution where we lived, but Reiri quickly disregarded that rule within a week of her arrival here.

LABEL: 0xBD6
STRING: It had long been my routine to carry a plate of Reiri's food to her room every night at mealtime.

LABEL: 0xC4D
STRING: 「Reiri, I'll leave the food here.」

LABEL: 0xC80
STRING: There was no reply.

LABEL: 0xC98
STRING: It was the same as always.

LABEL: 0xCB6
STRING: When I came to collect the food after dinner, depending on her mood and physical condition that day, there were always some signs that she'd touched it, so I guess it wasn't that she couldn't hear me.

LABEL: 0xD53
STRING: I casually looked around the room as I placed the plate on the table.

LABEL: 0xDA2
STRING: I felt like the volume of books had increased again.

LABEL: 0xDD2
STRING: I didn't know how much those piles of books piled all over the place were worth, but I doubted she'd gotten them for free.

LABEL: 0xE4E
STRING: The source of her funds was a mystery.

LABEL: 0xE76
STRING: However, there was no way Reiri would resort to something dangerous.

LABEL: 0xEC8
STRING: It would be bad if I pried too much and offended her.

LABEL: 0xEF9
STRING: I turned on my heel as usual and started leaving the room.

LABEL: 0xF43
STRING: 「Nee-san.」

LABEL: 0xF5C
STRING: She called out to me in a whispering voice.

LABEL: 0xF84
STRING: Her voice was hoarse, as if she wasn't used to speaking.

LABEL: 0xFBA
STRING: A provocative voice―like a brand new notebook being slowly ripped open.

LABEL: 0xFFD
STRING: Surprised, I turned around again and saw Reiri turned around in her chair.

LABEL: 0x1052
STRING: My sister, who I hadn't seen face-to-face in a while, looked thinner again, wrapped in her loose-fitting shirt.

LABEL: 0x10A6
STRING: Her bony body felt like it would rot if exposed to the open air.

LABEL: 0x10E8
STRING: Within her lifeless face, only her eyes shone strangely dark.

LABEL: 0x112E
STRING: 「What's wrong, Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x1153
STRING: 「Actually, I need to talk to you about something.

LABEL: 0x117C
STRING: Let's eat together,%NNee-san.」

LABEL: 0x11A5
STRING: That was unexpected.

LABEL: 0x11C0
STRING: And more than that, I was happy.

LABEL: 0x11EF
STRING: Reiri's tendency to reject the company of others had been present since the accident, and I had thought I was among the ones she ostracized.

LABEL: 0x127E
STRING: So, for her to ask us to eat together...

LABEL: 0x12AB
STRING: What kind of a change of heart was this?

LABEL: 0x12D3
STRING: 「Okay. Hold on a second.」

LABEL: 0x1302
STRING: Taken aback by her words, I hurried downstairs to the dining hall.

LABEL: 0x1343
STRING: 「What's wrong? You're in such a hurry.」

LABEL: 0x1372
STRING: 「Reiri said we should eat together.」

LABEL: 0x139F
STRING: 「I see...

LABEL: 0x13B2
STRING: That's good then.」

LABEL: 0x13CF
STRING: 「Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x13E6
STRING: After putting my food on the tray, I headed back to Reiri's room.

LABEL: 0x144A
STRING: 「Itadakimasu!」

LABEL: 0x146B
STRING: 「Itadakimasu.」

LABEL: 0x148A
STRING: I wondered when the last time was.

LABEL: 0x14A6
STRING: Why was this common scene of sisters sitting around a table together so emotionally moving?

LABEL: 0x14FB
STRING: Eating food while using plates of different colors side by side, a scene you could find everywhere.

LABEL: 0x1547
STRING: It was just that we were supposed to be those kinds of "sisters," too...

LABEL: 0x1588
STRING: When I thought about it, we'd hardly behaved like sisters since we came to this institution.

LABEL: 0x15DE
STRING: 「It's delicious.」

LABEL: 0x15FB
STRING: 「Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x1612
STRING: 「What did you want to talk about?」

LABEL: 0x1635
STRING: 「Let's eat first.」

LABEL: 0x165A
STRING: Only the sound of clashing tableware could be heard.

LABEL: 0x1682
STRING: But, it wasn't awkward.

LABEL: 0x16A6
STRING: We were close enough that we could be quiet in each other's company, like a married couple...

LABEL: 0x16E8
STRING: Family.

LABEL: 0x16FD
STRING: I got along well with everyone here, but I was still reserved in some ways.

LABEL: 0x1747
STRING: That wasn't it. We were really close, but...

LABEL: 0x177A
STRING: Eventually, Reiri returned her chopsticks to their place.

LABEL: 0x17AD
STRING: More than half of her food was left on the plate.

LABEL: 0x17D9
STRING: 「Are you sick?」

LABEL: 0x17F6
STRING: 「I'm already full.」

LABEL: 0x1819
STRING: 「It's still going to take me a while. Is that okay?」

LABEL: 0x1844
STRING: 「That's fine.」

LABEL: 0x185D
STRING: Reiri gave up on eating quickly and wrapped her hands around her teacup, and slowly took a sip.

LABEL: 0x18B3
STRING: The sight of her moistening her lips and bringing the tea to her mouth bit by bit was like that of an old man, depending on how you looked at it.

LABEL: 0x1905
STRING: But there was youthful passion there in her eyes.

LABEL: 0x1942
STRING: When I finished eating and looked up, my eyes met hers.

LABEL: 0x197E
STRING: Reiri's thin lips opened.

LABEL: 0x19A0
STRING: 「What I wanted to talk about is high school.」

LABEL: 0x19E1
STRING: 「High school... But we're still in our first year of middle school?」

LABEL: 0x1A11
STRING: Her unexpected confession took me by surprise.

LABEL: 0x1A4D
STRING: I still felt like a fresh student every day, but I wondered how Reiri felt about it.

LABEL: 0x1ABC
STRING: My reaction seemed to be within her expectations, and she continued indifferently.

LABEL: 0x1B12
STRING: 「I'm going to go to some high school affiliated with a university.」

LABEL: 0x1B49
STRING: 「Why? High schools are the same no matter where you go, right?」

LABEL: 0x1B94
STRING: Even in middle school, Reiri only showed up the bare minimum amount.

LABEL: 0x1BD1
STRING: She had probably never showed up for class and spent all her days in the infirmary.

LABEL: 0x1C34
STRING: In that case, wouldn't she be the same way in high school?

LABEL: 0x1C71
STRING: 「I'm pretty close to the limit of what I can understand from reading. I've even started to limit my field of study to some extent...

LABEL: 0x1CD3
STRING: I'll need much more input from now on.」

LABEL: 0x1D17
STRING: 「What do you mean?」

LABEL: 0x1D38
STRING: 「There are limits to what I can obtain through my personal efforts. There are papers that can only be read in university libraries and archives, like research data that hasn't yet been published as a paper.

LABEL: 0x1DC6
STRING: In addition, there are facilities for research and experimentation.」

LABEL: 0x1DF7
STRING: 「Research and experiments...」

LABEL: 0x1E18
STRING: 「Yes. I need to do more than just read books. I need to put my knowledge into practice.

LABEL: 0x1E68
STRING: I don't know how much of it'll be necessary for me, but I'm interested, so it'll be a good demonstration.」

LABEL: 0x1ED8
STRING: 「...Do you want to do dissections or something?」

LABEL: 0x1F05
STRING: Speaking of experiments, I was reminded that we had a frog dissection at school next week.

LABEL: 0x1F50
STRING: The only other thing that came to mind was... Pythagora Switch.

LABEL: 0x1F95
STRING: My imagination might be poor, but I didn't think I was that far off the mark.

LABEL: 0x1FE0
STRING: Reiri nodded, unfazed.

LABEL: 0x2004
STRING: 「If I was to use our own rabbits for dissection, it would be a big deal if I was found out. Even a trivial experiment like that requires a certain amount of funding, tools, and position.

LABEL: 0x20A0
STRING: I need to enter university facilities for that, and affiliated high schools are the quickest way to do so.」

LABEL: 0x211F
STRING: I understood what Reiri was saying―no, actually, I didn't get even half of it.

LABEL: 0x2166
STRING: All I could tell was that what she was saying was logical and, in a sense, correct.

LABEL: 0x21CB
STRING: I got that it made sense, but even so...

LABEL: 0x220D
STRING: In the end, this was just an exchange between kids.

LABEL: 0x222E
STRING: We were only thirteen.

LABEL: 0x2251
STRING: It was too early for all that, no matter how you looked at it.

LABEL: 0x2277
STRING: 「Can't you wait until you're a university student?」

LABEL: 0x22A6
STRING: 「No. I'd like to head there right now if I could. You know I'm impatient, don't you?」

LABEL: 0x2323
STRING: To the point of giving up sleep...

LABEL: 0x234F
STRING: This gathering seemed to be more important than sleep, at least.

LABEL: 0x238E
STRING: 「...But, what about money?」

LABEL: 0x23B3
STRING: 「It'll work out somehow... I think.」

LABEL: 0x23DA
STRING: Reiri answered the most realistic concern with ease.

LABEL: 0x2418
STRING: 「I have a plan in mind.」

LABEL: 0x243B
STRING: 「I'm looking into scholarships, and at the very least, I should be able to get one here. Well... I don't want to rely on them too much, but I don't think they'd refuse me because of my position.

LABEL: 0x24D3
STRING: If they think of it as an "investment" in me, they'll save face and it would be easier for them to pay.」

LABEL: 0x2559
STRING: I didn't really understand what she was saying in the second half, as usual, but since Reiri said it was okay, I guess it was okay.

LABEL: 0x25D1
STRING: She took another sip from her teacup.

LABEL: 0x25FB
STRING: I followed suit and filled my mouth with lukewarm tea as I thought.

LABEL: 0x263F
STRING: "Thought," I said, but I'd already reached a conclusion.

LABEL: 0x2678
STRING: I asked her a lot of questions, but I knew that Reiri was thinking about it properly.

LABEL: 0x26C1
STRING: It's always been the same.

LABEL: 0x26DF
STRING: I was relieved.

LABEL: 0x2702
STRING: If that was what Reiri wanted, then as her older sister, I'd support her.

LABEL: 0x2741
STRING: I swallowed my tea in one gulp and looked at her in front of me.

LABEL: 0x277F
STRING: 「That's good, isn't it? Why don't you go for it?」

LABEL: 0x27B2
STRING: 「I'm planning to.」

LABEL: 0x27CD
STRING: Reiri smiled.

LABEL: 0x27EA
STRING: Her face, lacking in fat, twitched... but her straightforward smile was somehow charming.

LABEL: 0x2853
STRING: She hadn't changed, after all.

LABEL: 0x2885
STRING: 「Well then, Nee-san, good luck.」

LABEL: 0x28B6
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x28CF
STRING: I couldn't help but let out a strange voice.

LABEL: 0x28F3
STRING: Reiri gulped down another sip of tea and continued calmly.

LABEL: 0x293E
STRING: 「High school. There's no way I can go alone, right? And with my academic ability, I shouldn't have any problem passing the entrance exam. The real problem is you.」

LABEL: 0x29BA
STRING: 「W-Wait a minute.」

LABEL: 0x29E0
STRING: It was true that Reiri, who was physically weak, required a chaperone to accompany her to school about once a month.

LABEL: 0x2A36
STRING: From the time we changed elementary schools to entering middle school, it had been my role to accompany her.

LABEL: 0x2A8A
STRING: That would probably continue to be the case in high school, but...

LABEL: 0x2AD1
STRING: 「No way... I'm not smart like you, Reiri. There's no way I'll――」

LABEL: 0x2B32
STRING: 「You'll be fine.」

LABEL: 0x2B4B
STRING: Reiri spoke slowly, as if trying to convince me.

LABEL: 0x2B9F
STRING: Her voice was thin and hoarse, but there was a sense of confidence and kindness in it.

LABEL: 0x2BEF
STRING: 「I guarantee it. You can do it if you try, Touri.」

LABEL: 0x2C2C
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x2C47
STRING: 「So, don't worry about it.」

LABEL: 0x2C6A
STRING: And so, Reiri admonished me.

LABEL: 0x2C8E
STRING: At this rate, there was no telling who was the older sister.

LABEL: 0x2CC6
STRING: I couldn't help but smile.

LABEL: 0x2CEF
STRING: 「...What?」

LABEL: 0x2D10
STRING: 「You're still the same...」

LABEL: 0x2DF6
STRING: 「Thank you for the meal.」

LABEL: 0x2E1B
STRING: 「Thank you for the meal.」

LABEL: 0x2E40
STRING: Had we been chatting for half an hour?

LABEL: 0x2E74
STRING: Reiri said she was tired and decided to leave the table.

LABEL: 0x2EAF
STRING: I gathered our dishes.

LABEL: 0x2ED8
STRING: Reiri muttered as she stared at the fingers on my left hand.

LABEL: 0x2F04
STRING: 「...Huh? Nee-san, the ring.」

LABEL: 0x2F2D
STRING: I stopped and raised my left hand.

LABEL: 0x2F57
STRING: My fingers were undecorated.

LABEL: 0x2F7D
STRING: Until a few days ago, there had been a ring there.

LABEL: 0x2FBA
STRING: Just a normal silver ring.

LABEL: 0x2FED
STRING: It was one of the few mementos of our Mother.

LABEL: 0x3017
STRING: 「You see... I lost it the other day. I searched for it, but I couldn't find it anywhere...」

LABEL: 0x3078
STRING: 「I see.」

LABEL: 0x308F
STRING: 「It's a shame... The size didn't fit and I thought there wasn't much I could do if I lost it.」

LABEL: 0x3111
STRING: The conversation ended.

LABEL: 0x312D
STRING: Reiri fell silent as she thought about something.

LABEL: 0x316E
STRING: I finished gathering the rest of the dishes and stood up.

LABEL: 0x31A6
STRING: 「Well, I'll bring these back down.」

LABEL: 0x31C9
STRING: 「Ah... Nee-san.」

LABEL: 0x31EA
STRING: 「Hm?」

LABEL: 0x3201
STRING: 「If――

LABEL: 0x3214
STRING: No, never mind. Thanks for today.」

LABEL: 0x3249
STRING: 「? Sure.」

LABEL: 0x3264
STRING: Reiri, who had been about to say something, ended up shutting her mouth.

LABEL: 0x32A0
STRING: After seeing her off, I left her room.

LABEL: 0x32D2
STRING: Freezing in the cold hallway, I hurried to the cafeteria where everyone else was.

LABEL: 0x33F8
STRING: I didn't remember exactly when it was.

LABEL: 0x3431
STRING: At some point, Reiri stopped sleeping, even at night.

LABEL: 0x3466
STRING: And I didn't mean metaphorically. She literally stopped sleeping.

LABEL: 0x34A6
STRING: Twenty-four hours from morning to night, from Monday to Saturday.

LABEL: 0x34E3
STRING: She continued to sit at her desk without a wink of sleep.

LABEL: 0x3513
STRING: Then, on the weekends, she would fall into a coma.

LABEL: 0x354C
STRING: It couldn't be called sleeping. It was like she had died.

LABEL: 0x3596
STRING: How long had she been living a life that should have collapsed long ago?

LABEL: 0x35EB
STRING: What drove her that far?

LABEL: 0x3625
STRING: For what?

LABEL: 0x3640
STRING: For whom?

LABEL: 0x365B
STRING: Even I, her twin sister, didn't know.

LABEL: 0x3687
STRING: Now that Mom was gone, I was sure no one knew.

LABEL: 0x36BF
STRING: Or would someone, someone smarter, understand?

LABEL: 0x3700
STRING: Someone that Reiri trusted.

LABEL: 0x3727
STRING: If there was such a person out there somewhere...

LABEL: 0x3752
STRING: If there was, then, I wondered.

LABEL: 0x3780
STRING: I didn't understand.

LABEL: 0x3798
STRING: I didn't want to understand, but...

LABEL: 0x37BE
STRING: Since I didn't understand, I was worried.

LABEL: 0x37E9
STRING: On nights when I was too anxious to sleep, I listened carefully to the sound of Reiri turning the pages and running her pen over them.

LABEL: 0x383F
STRING: She was on the other side, separated by a single sliding door.

LABEL: 0x3877
STRING: Having escaped the tormenting second hand of the clock, I felt relieved.

LABEL: 0x38A8
STRING: Reiri would always be there.

LABEL: 0x38CC
STRING: Next to me.

LABEL: 0x38E2
STRING: She wasn't going anywhere.

LABEL: 0x3903
STRING: That was enough for me.

LABEL: 0x3939
STRING: ――And yet...

LABEL: 0x39F7
STRING: After waking up in the middle of the night for the first time in a while, I noticed something strange and slowly opened the door.

LABEL: 0x3A4E
STRING: I knew it.

LABEL: 0x3A67
STRING: Even at night, her room was brightly lit by fluorescent lights.

LABEL: 0x3A97
STRING: Covering my eyes with the palm of my hand, I surveyed the room.

LABEL: 0x3ADE
STRING: There were lots of technical books and printed materials.

LABEL: 0x3B10
STRING: Her room was by no means cluttered, but there was plenty of room to clean up.

LABEL: 0x3B5C
STRING: A heavy-looking book and a half-written notebook were still open on the desk by the wall.

LABEL: 0x3BA0
STRING: Only, their master had disappeared.

LABEL: 0x3BD2
STRING: 「Reiri...」

LABEL: 0x3BED
STRING: Calm down.

LABEL: 0x3C03
STRING: There were plenty of reasons for her to leave the room, like going to the bathroom or getting a drink.

LABEL: 0x3C63
STRING: She should be back soon.

LABEL: 0x3C88
STRING: That was obvious.

LABEL: 0x3CAB
STRING: Could something have happened...? If so, what would that even be?

LABEL: 0x3CEB
STRING: That couldn't be.

LABEL: 0x3D05
STRING: I was overthinking it.

LABEL: 0x3D1D
STRING: I knew that.

LABEL: 0x3D35
STRING: I knew, but...

LABEL: 0x3D62
STRING: I thought back to Reiri this evening.

LABEL: 0x3D87
STRING: I was so excited that Reiri wanted to eat together that I didn't stop to think why she wanted to do that in the first place.

LABEL: 0x3DF7
STRING: That had never happened before, and all of a sudden, she'd disappeared at night.

LABEL: 0x3E49
STRING: It would be strange for there not to be a connection.

LABEL: 0x3E71
STRING: What was Reiri thinking?

LABEL: 0x3E96
STRING: What was she trying to do...?

LABEL: 0x3ECC
STRING: What did I know about Reiri?

LABEL: 0x3EF6
STRING: I impulsively let go of the doorknob for a moment and put on the fleece hanging on the wall.

LABEL: 0x3F44
STRING: When I went out into the hallway, sure enough, it was freezing cold.

LABEL: 0x3F79
STRING: I could feel a piercing coldness through my slippers.

LABEL: 0x3FBE
STRING: With my head cooled down, I came to the conclusion that I should be quiet during the night.

LABEL: 0x4021
STRING: ...After calming down, I realized that I couldn't go about it like Reiri.

LABEL: 0x4065
STRING: I quietly closed the door behind me.

LABEL: 0x408D
STRING: I made my way down the stairs, taking care not to let the floorboards creak.

LABEL: 0x40CD
STRING: Then, as I stood on the first floor where all I could hear was the sound of the ventilation fan motor, I felt a strange sense of naughtiness.

LABEL: 0x412A
STRING: There was no one here...

LABEL: 0x4146
STRING: There shouldn't be.

LABEL: 0x4165
STRING: I strode into the living room, looking for Reiri, who was sure to be somewhere around here.

LABEL: 0x41A7
STRING: For some reason, I was hesitant to turn on the lights, but there was no problem.

LABEL: 0x41EB
STRING: The south side of the living room facing the garden had a window, which was faintly bright even at night.

LABEL: 0x4244
STRING: When I glanced out that window, I saw a figure.

LABEL: 0x4280
STRING: 「...Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x429D
STRING: I hurried over to her.

LABEL: 0x42D5
STRING: I was about to call out to her when I noticed something.

LABEL: 0x42FE
STRING: That was strange.

LABEL: 0x4314
STRING: Something was wrong.

LABEL: 0x4332
STRING: The first thing I noticed was Reiri's clothes.

LABEL: 0x4365
STRING: She was wearing nothing but her thin loungewear in the cold of night.

LABEL: 0x439E
STRING: It was freezing even inside the building.

LABEL: 0x43DD
STRING: She, however, showed no signs of feeling the cold as she stood firmly in the middle of the garden.

LABEL: 0x4436
STRING: Even stranger was the rabbit in her hand.

LABEL: 0x447A
STRING: It was the rabbit kept in this institution.

LABEL: 0x44A7
STRING: One that we had raised.

LABEL: 0x44CA
STRING: The rabbit everyone loved.

LABEL: 0x44F7
STRING: A cute rabbit.

LABEL: 0x4518
STRING: Up until yesterday, the rabbit had been running around energetically.

LABEL: 0x4557
STRING: It had been full of energy.

LABEL: 0x4577
STRING: The rabbit was dead.

LABEL: 0x4591
STRING: The rabbit in Reiri's hand.

LABEL: 0x45B6
STRING: It was dead.

LABEL: 0x45D1
STRING: That was the feeling I got.

LABEL: 0x45EC
STRING: But, I still didn't know, did I?

LABEL: 0x4615
STRING: It didn't move.

LABEL: 0x462E
STRING: It was dead.

LABEL: 0x4648
STRING: I wasn't sure.

LABEL: 0x4663
STRING: Why?

LABEL: 0x467C
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x4693
STRING: Why did Reiri...?

LABEL: 0x46B1
STRING: Why was she...?

LABEL: 0x46D0
STRING: A knife?

LABEL: 0x46E9
STRING: Wavering red.

LABEL: 0x4702
STRING: A knife.

LABEL: 0x4719
STRING: Dripping liquid.

LABEL: 0x4732
STRING: Red.

LABEL: 0x4747
STRING: My voice would no longer come out.

LABEL: 0x4769
STRING: I couldn't say anything.

LABEL: 0x4783
STRING: What could I say?

LABEL: 0x479D
STRING: What should I say?

LABEL: 0x47B9
STRING: What must I say?

LABEL: 0x47E2
STRING: After a while, in contrast to my hesitation, Reiri walked forward without wavering.

LABEL: 0x482D
STRING: She dragged the rabbit to a corner of the garden and stabbed the knife in her hand into its stomach.

LABEL: 0x488E
STRING: There was no sound.

LABEL: 0x48AB
STRING: The rabbit's blood spilled out apologetically and without vigor――

LABEL: 0x48E5
STRING: It must have long since lost its life.

LABEL: 0x4915
STRING: Layer by layer, Reiri tore through the dead rabbit.

LABEL: 0x4952
STRING: She dismantled its body.

LABEL: 0x497B
STRING: Her hands were steady.

LABEL: 0x4999
STRING: As if she was inspecting something, the rabbit's corpse was carefully examined as it was chopped to pieces.

LABEL: 0x49DD
STRING: As I gazed through the window, I regained my composure looking at her repeated acts.

LABEL: 0x4A27
STRING: What for?

LABEL: 0x4A3F
STRING: What was she thinking?

LABEL: 0x4B07
STRING: I never understood what Reiri did or said.

LABEL: 0x4B52
STRING: But... I was sure whatever she did was right.

LABEL: 0x4B89
STRING: I'd always believed that what Reiri thought wasn't wrong.

LABEL: 0x4BD0
STRING: But now――

LABEL: 0x4BED
STRING: ――It was no good.

LABEL: 0x4C08
STRING: I didn't understand.

LABEL: 0x4C23
STRING: I truly didn't understand.

LABEL: 0x4C45
STRING: Could I believe Reiri?

LABEL: 0x4C6B
STRING: Did I have to believe her?

LABEL: 0x4C8F
STRING: Why couldn't I believe her?

LABEL: 0x4CB6
STRING: 「I don't understand what she's thinking.」

LABEL: 0x4CE5
STRING: 「It's creepy.」

LABEL: 0x4D02
STRING: Everyone in the institution often said it.

LABEL: 0x4D2D
STRING: Each time, I objected.

LABEL: 0x4D51
STRING: 「That's not true.」

LABEL: 0x4D74
STRING: 「You don't know anything about Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x4DA9
STRING: Would I be able to say that now?

LABEL: 0x4DD2
STRING: Was I allowed to...?

LABEL: 0x4DF8
STRING: After a while, Reiri stood up, dug into the ground with her knife, and buried the disassembled rabbit there.

LABEL: 0x4E61
STRING: She looked satisfied as she stood up.

LABEL: 0x4E94
STRING: I wondered why.

LABEL: 0x4EAC
STRING: Under the moonlight, my twin sister was colored by blood and dirt.

LABEL: 0x4EE7
STRING: She was smiling.

LABEL: 0x4F02
STRING: It was a similar smile to the one she had shown me during dinner a few hours earlier.

LABEL: 0x505A
STRING: The morning sun peeking through the curtains shook my consciousness violently.

LABEL: 0x5095
STRING: I was roused from my slumber and wrapped myself under the covers again due to the chilly weather.

LABEL: 0x50EC
STRING: According to the cell phone at my bedside, I had to start getting ready within ten minutes.

LABEL: 0x513D
STRING: Not a lot of time to spare.

LABEL: 0x515C
STRING: Still, I couldn't bring myself to get up right away, so I squirmed under the covers and made up excuses.

LABEL: 0x51C6
STRING: A normal morning.

LABEL: 0x51E5
STRING: Was that thing last night a dream?

LABEL: 0x5214
STRING: It felt so unreal.

LABEL: 0x523D
STRING: How was Reiri fine even under the freezing sky?

LABEL: 0x528E
STRING: I know it was impossible.

LABEL: 0x52B9
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x52D0
STRING: If it were real, what would I do?

LABEL: 0x530A
STRING: Tell someone?

LABEL: 0x5325
STRING: That was impossible.

LABEL: 0x534C
STRING: I couldn't betray Reiri.

LABEL: 0x5371
STRING: But could I just let it go as if nothing had happened?

LABEL: 0x53BB
STRING: Would I question her?

LABEL: 0x53D9
STRING: Even if it meant losing her?

LABEL: 0x5408
STRING: What was I looking for?

LABEL: 0x5430
STRING: An excuse for Reiri?

LABEL: 0x545C
STRING: Did I want her to explain?

LABEL: 0x5485
STRING: Even though I knew I wouldn't understand.

LABEL: 0x54B1
STRING: I knew that.

LABEL: 0x54CE
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x54E4
STRING: I looked at the closed sliding door.

LABEL: 0x5511
STRING: From the other side, I could hear the sound of pages being turned at a rate of one every few seconds.

LABEL: 0x5560
STRING: I'd know if I checked.

LABEL: 0x5587
STRING: I knew that if I asked Reiri, I'd understand.

LABEL: 0x55C2
STRING: But――

LABEL: 0x55E4
STRING: Beep, beep, beep.

LABEL: 0x55FB
STRING: Ten minutes.

LABEL: 0x5610
STRING: I shut off my alarm and my thoughts at the same time and crawled out of bed.

LABEL: 0x573C
STRING: Don't think about unnecessary things.

LABEL: 0x5763
STRING: That was what I told myself.

LABEL: 0x5787
STRING: I dragged myself up the stairs, still having a bedhead.

LABEL: 0x57BE
STRING: Did I always do that?

LABEL: 0x57E8
STRING: I was sure I did.

LABEL: 0x5805
STRING: And, what did I usually think about?

LABEL: 0x582D
STRING: Right.

LABEL: 0x5841
STRING: What was for breakfast?

LABEL: 0x5863
STRING: It had been bread all the time lately, so I guessed today was no different.

LABEL: 0x5897
STRING: Normally, I'd have to eat at least two pieces of bread to get going.

LABEL: 0x58D8
STRING: Come to think of it, gym class started at first period today.

LABEL: 0x590D
STRING: I didn't want to go out to the field in this cold weather.

LABEL: 0x5939
STRING: What was second period again?

LABEL: 0x595D
STRING: Oh yeah, there was a math quiz this afternoon.

LABEL: 0x5997
STRING: I could probably catch up if I studied during lunch break, but it would also affect my grades, so I couldn't be too complacent.

LABEL: 0x59FE
STRING: And then, and then――

LABEL: 0x5A22
STRING: 「The rabbit's gone! I went to feed it, but it wasn't there!」

LABEL: 0x5A6B
STRING: 「There's a trail of blood! Someone killed it!」

LABEL: 0x5AA0
STRING: Overwhelming reality.

LABEL: 0x5ABA
STRING: My vision warped.

LABEL: 0x5AD2
STRING: Was it an illusion melting away?

LABEL: 0x5AF2
STRING: The chaotic mass of things and events became untangled and gently floated to the surface.

LABEL: 0x5B3B
STRING: And then―gravity.

LABEL: 0x5B57
STRING: A delayed blink.

LABEL: 0x5B6F
STRING: A sensation of losing support and falling.

LABEL: 0x5BA4
STRING: That's right.

LABEL: 0x5BBA
STRING: I remembered that I was on my way down the stairs.

LABEL: 0x5BED
STRING: Keep going down and down, just like this.

LABEL: 0x5C13
STRING: 「Nomura!」

LABEL: 0x5C2C
STRING: I jumped up at the sound of his voice and reached for the nearest railing.

LABEL: 0x5C68
STRING: The voice belonged to a boy my age.

LABEL: 0x5C94
STRING: We were in the same class at school.

LABEL: 0x5CBA
STRING: He looked at me with concern as I clung to the railing, trying to maintain my balance.

LABEL: 0x5D07
STRING: 「Are you all right? You don't look so good.」

LABEL: 0x5D38
STRING: 「Yeah... Sorry.」

LABEL: 0x5D59
STRING: 「I'm a little tired... I think I might have a cold. I'll sleep in my room. Breakfast can wait.」

LABEL: 0x5DB4
STRING: 「Okay. Take it easy.」

LABEL: 0x5DD8
STRING: He saw me off, and I returned to my room.

LABEL: 0x5DFA
STRING: That short journey was more than enough for me to prepare myself.

LABEL: 0x5E36
STRING: I stood in front of Reiri's room and opened the door, not from the bedroom side.

LABEL: 0x5E87
STRING: 「Reiri, can I have a word?」

LABEL: 0x5EAE
STRING: She sat at her desk with her back turned, and I walked over to her.

LABEL: 0x5EEE
STRING: The most important piece that was missing last night...

LABEL: 0x5F24
STRING: Reiri spun around in her chair and turned to face me, looking happy.

LABEL: 0x5F6F
STRING: 「Ah, I wanted to talk to you, too.」

LABEL: 0x6085
STRING: We twins faced each other across the low table.

LABEL: 0x60B6
STRING: Deja vu.

LABEL: 0x60D1
STRING: The only thing different from yesterday was the clothes, huh?

LABEL: 0x60F9
STRING: I was in my pajamas, and my hair was all bouncy.

LABEL: 0x6125
STRING: Reiri was also wearing different clothes from yesterday.

LABEL: 0x614D
STRING: She must have changed her clothes after that.

LABEL: 0x6175
STRING: After that...

LABEL: 0x6190
STRING: I shook my head and wiped out the bloodstained image of Reiri from last night.

LABEL: 0x61D0
STRING: 「What's wrong?」

LABEL: 0x61EF
STRING: 「Nothing...」

LABEL: 0x620A
STRING: 「? So, what did you want to talk about?」

LABEL: 0x623F
STRING: Reiri looked dubious.

LABEL: 0x625D
STRING: I couldn't say anything... no.

LABEL: 0x6283
STRING: I had to say it.

LABEL: 0x62A0
STRING: Reiri was waiting in front of me.

LABEL: 0x62C6
STRING: I didn't have time to choose my words carefully.

LABEL: 0x62ED
STRING: I opened my mouth hesitantly.

LABEL: 0x6313
STRING: 「Reiri...」

LABEL: 0x632E
STRING: 「Yeah?」

LABEL: 0x6347
STRING: 「What were you doing last night?」

LABEL: 0x642B
STRING: Tick, tock.

LABEL: 0x6444
STRING: The second hand of the clock.

LABEL: 0x6459
STRING: I could hear the clamor downstairs in the distance.

LABEL: 0x648E
STRING: There was too much to do in the morning within that limited time.

LABEL: 0x64C0
STRING: It would be fine if it was just one person, but because everyone was panicking, it led to a big commotion.

LABEL: 0x650A
STRING: I could see dead branches swaying in the wind outside the window.

LABEL: 0x6540
STRING: Unlike the hands of a clock, they ticked unevenly.

LABEL: 0x657B
STRING: Their capricious rhythm seemed to calm my heart somehow.

LABEL: 0x65C5
STRING: Reiri hung her head and kept silent.

LABEL: 0x65F1
STRING: She looked like a withered doll.

LABEL: 0x6627
STRING: There was no trace of the girl who had been so talkative yesterday.

LABEL: 0x665D
STRING: I was waiting for her to say something.

LABEL: 0x6687
STRING: I wanted her to say something.

LABEL: 0x66AA
STRING: But, what did I want her to say?

LABEL: 0x66DD
STRING: I didn't know―no.

LABEL: 0x66FD
STRING: Anything was fine.

LABEL: 0x6715
STRING: As long as Reiri said something, it was fine.

LABEL: 0x6749
STRING: As I was thinking that, Reiri opened her mouth with her eyes still downcast.

LABEL: 0x679B
STRING: 「It's as you saw.」

LABEL: 0x67CB
STRING: I hadn't expected that.

LABEL: 0x67F5
STRING: Reiri's tone was not admonishing but simply indifferent.

LABEL: 0x6838
STRING: 「No way... Why...?」

LABEL: 0x685F
STRING: 「Why?」

LABEL: 0x687A
STRING: Reiri entangled me as I searched for words that made sense.

LABEL: 0x68B3
STRING: When she looked up at me, I cowered.

LABEL: 0x68E4
STRING: 「Why shouldn't it die?

LABEL: 0x6916
STRING: Isn't it pitiful to keep it alive?」

LABEL: 0x6950
STRING: 「Reiri――」

LABEL: 0x696B
STRING: 「Can you really say that rabbit was alive while being given food and being toyed with as humans wished?

LABEL: 0x69D5
STRING: %[They say that they "love" it only to justify their dominance over something, using it in a way that's useful to them,

LABEL: 0x6A3B
STRING: and when it dies, they say it's pitiful and push their own sadness and worthlessness onto it.

LABEL: 0x6A99
STRING: And yet, rabbits are satisfied with what's given to them by those around them, and they enjoy the life given to them without doing anything, without being able to do anything...

LABEL: 0x6B11
STRING: What's the difference between that and being dead to begin with?

LABEL: 0x6B49
STRING: If it's for something more important than that life, then it's inevitable for it to be killed, isn't it?」

LABEL: 0x6B97
STRING: Like a dam that had burst, Reiri wouldn't stop.

LABEL: 0x6BCB
STRING: I was far too weak to stop her waves of logic surging through me.

LABEL: 0x6C10
STRING: 「But if you say that, we――」

LABEL: 0x6C4B
STRING: 「That's right.

LABEL: 0x6C60
STRING: If you make no effort to survive, you can't complain that%Nyou're dead.

LABEL: 0x6CB8
STRING: In order to survive, we must continue to prove to those who determine the value of our lives that we have value in being alive.

LABEL: 0x6D40
STRING: If you don't keep proving it, you can't complain about being killed at any moment.

LABEL: 0x6D82
STRING: Even you should understand that, right, Nee-san?」

LABEL: 0x6DC2
STRING: I averted my eyes from Reiri's gouging gaze.

LABEL: 0x6DF7
STRING: I should understand?

LABEL: 0x6E18
STRING: Understand what?

LABEL: 0x6E2D
STRING: What was she talking about...?

LABEL: 0x6E55
STRING: Reiri spat out her words.

LABEL: 0x6E7C
STRING: 「Mom was the same way.」

LABEL: 0x6EA1
STRING: 「Why are you bringing up Mom――」

LABEL: 0x6EC6
STRING: 「I mean, there's no reason she had to die otherwise.

LABEL: 0x6F08
STRING: If you think you want to live, can you live?

LABEL: 0x6F34
STRING: If you say you want to die, can you die?

LABEL: 0x6F5A
STRING: If you want to live, you have to earn the right. If you're not making any effort and just taking your current life for granted, then whether you live or die doesn't really matter――」

LABEL: 0x6FEF
STRING: 「Stop it already!!」

LABEL: 0x700F
STRING: I stood up.

LABEL: 0x7031
STRING: Reiri looked at me in silence.

LABEL: 0x705A
STRING: Her eyes still had a strong light in them, but I couldn't tell what color they were.

LABEL: 0x70AE
STRING: For some reason, I felt like I was being blamed, so I sat down again.

LABEL: 0x70ED
STRING: 「S-Sorry.」

LABEL: 0x710A
STRING: 「It's fine.」

LABEL: 0x7123
STRING: Our eyes met again.

LABEL: 0x713D
STRING: I smiled in embarrassment.

LABEL: 0x7168
STRING: There was no smile on Reiri's face.

LABEL: 0x7289
STRING: 「Speaking of which, what did you want to talk about?」

LABEL: 0x72B6
STRING: 「Oh, Mom's――」

LABEL: 0x72DB
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x72F4
STRING: 「No, it's nothing... Just take this.」

LABEL: 0x7329
STRING: Saying that, Reiri held out a thin silver chain.

LABEL: 0x736D
STRING: It was a simple, unadorned accessory, but I had no idea that Reiri had such a thing.

LABEL: 0x73C9
STRING: 「A necklace chain? What about it?」

LABEL: 0x7404
STRING: 「I bought it for an experiment. I had one left over. If you don't need it, get rid of it.」

LABEL: 0x7459
STRING: 「Uh, okay... Thanks?」

LABEL: 0x7484
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x755A
STRING: After being chased out, I closed the sliding door and dove straight into my futon.

LABEL: 0x75A5
STRING: I pulled the covers over me and looked up at the ceiling.

LABEL: 0x75D0
STRING: *Clack*

LABEL: 0x75E7
STRING: At that moment, the door opened.

LABEL: 0x760D
STRING: 「Nomura, are you okay?」

LABEL: 0x762E
STRING: What good timing.

LABEL: 0x7655
STRING: 「How are you feeling?」

LABEL: 0x7680
STRING: 「Yeah, I guess I'm okay.」

LABEL: 0x76A9
STRING: 「Hmm?」

LABEL: 0x76C4
STRING: While I tried to pretend I was asleep, he gave me a suspicious look, then took two or three steps closer and immediately made a pained face.

LABEL: 0x774C
STRING: 「Ouch! ...I stepped on something. Make sure you clean properly. You're a girl, aren't you?」

LABEL: 0x779F
STRING: 「That's rude. I clean my room.」

LABEL: 0x77DE
STRING: 「Then, what's this?」

LABEL: 0x7805
STRING: When I saw what he picked up, I yelled without thinking.

LABEL: 0x7848
STRING: 「My ring!」

LABEL: 0x7865
STRING: 「Whoa. Don't shout so suddenly.」

LABEL: 0x788C
STRING: It was the memento from our Mom that I had been looking for all this time.

LABEL: 0x78CA
STRING: How did it end up here?

LABEL: 0x78F3
STRING: I guess you could say it was darkest under the lighthouse... but even so, I really had been searching for it for the past few days and hadn't been able to find it.

LABEL: 0x795E
STRING: It was kind of difficult to accept when it was found so easily.

LABEL: 0x799F
STRING: I felt like it was cleaner than it was before I lost it...

LABEL: 0x79E4
STRING: He looked back and forth between my outstretched hand and the ring.

LABEL: 0x7A22
STRING: 「This isn't the right size, is it?」

LABEL: 0x7A4F
STRING: 「Yeah... It isn't mine to begin with――」

LABEL: 0x7A82
STRING: 「Oh, this is just the thing.」

LABEL: 0x7AB3
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x7ACA
STRING: 「Let me borrow this.」

LABEL: 0x7AE5
STRING: Before I could reply, he snatched the chain Reiri had given me, undid the clasp, and put the ring between them.

LABEL: 0x7B5B
STRING: 「Here you go.」

LABEL: 0x7B72
STRING: He threw it back to me.

LABEL: 0x7B96
STRING: It flew in a gentle arc, and I caught it with both hands.

LABEL: 0x7BCD
STRING: 「Th-Thanks.」

LABEL: 0x7BF0
STRING: 「Mm. I'll be going now. Nomura, be sure to come, even if you're late.」

LABEL: 0x7C3D
STRING: He waved his hand behind him and left.

LABEL: 0x7D23
STRING: I was left alone in my room.

LABEL: 0x7D44
STRING: In my hand was the ring that had returned to me.

LABEL: 0x7D6D
STRING: Reiri got angry.

LABEL: 0x7D8C
STRING: He was so blunt.

LABEL: 0x7DAC
STRING: Leaving behind each conversation, I rolled back under the covers.

LABEL: 0x7E13
STRING: I wondered what he came here for?

LABEL: 0x7E70
STRING: What was he thinking?

LABEL: 0x7E9D
STRING: What was Reiri thinking on the other side of the sliding door?

LABEL: 0x7EDE
STRING: I didn't know.

LABEL: 0x7EF9
STRING: I don't understand anything anymore.

LABEL: 0x7FF3
STRING: A few weeks later, Reiri went to a research institute at a national university and was selected for a certain project.
